00055         Caption::Caption(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, const Whole Glyph, String Text, UILayer* Layer)
00056             : Parent(Layer),
00057               MouseHover(false),
00058               RelPosition(Position),
00059               RelSize(Size),
00060               Name(name)
00061         {
00062             Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00063 
00064             Vector2 Window = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00065             GorillaCaption = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createCaption(Glyph, Position.X * Window.X, Position.Y * Window.Y, Text);
00066             GorillaCaption->size(Size.X * Window.X, Size.Y * Window.Y);
00067             GorillaRectangle = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createRectangle((Position * Window).GetOgreVector2(),(Size * Window).GetOgreVector2());
00068             GorillaCaption->background(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0,0));
00069             GorillaCaption->align(Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre);
00070             GorillaCaption->vertical_align(Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle);
00071         }
00072 
00073         Caption::~Caption()
00074         {
00075             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyCaption(GorillaCaption);
00076             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyRectangle(GorillaRectangle);
00077         }
00078 
00079         void Caption::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00080         {
00081             GorillaRectangle->SetVisible(Visible);
00082             GorillaCaption->SetVisible(Visible);
00083         }
00084 
00085         bool Caption::IsVisible()
00086         {
00087             return GorillaRectangle->IsVisible();
00088         }
00089 
00090         void Caption::Show()
00091         {
00092             GorillaRectangle->Show();
00093             GorillaCaption->Show();
00094         }
00095 
00096         void Caption::Hide()
00097         {
00098             GorillaRectangle->Hide();
00099             GorillaCaption->Hide();
00100         }

00102         bool Caption::CheckMouseHover()
00103         {
00104             if(!GorillaRectangle->IsVisible())
00105                 return false;
00106             Vector2 MouseLoc = Manager->GetGameWorld()->GetEventManager()->GetMouseCoords();
00107             if(GorillaCaption->intersects(MouseLoc.GetOgreVector2()))
00108             {
00109                 MouseHover = true;
00110             }else{
00111                 MouseHover = false;
00112             }
00113             return MouseHover;
00114         }
00115 
00116         bool Caption::GetMouseHover()
00117         {
00118             return MouseHover;
00119         }
00120

00122         {
00123             return Name;
00124         }
00125

00127         {
00128             GorillaCaption->text(Text);
00129         }
00130 
00131         String Caption::GetText()
00132         {
00133             return GorillaCaption->text();
00134         }

00137         {
00138             GorillaCaption->colour(TextColour.GetOgreColourValue());
00139         }

00142         {
00143             ColourValue Col(GorillaCaption->colour());

00173         void Caption::SetBackgroundSprite(const String& Name)
00174         {
00175             Gorilla::Sprite* GSprite = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->_getSprite(Name);
00176             GorillaRectangle->background_image(GSprite);
00177             //GorillaCaption->background(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0,0));
00178         }

00180         void Caption::HorizontallyAlign(UI::TextHorizontalAlign Align)
00181         {
00182             Gorilla::TextAlignment HA;
00183             switch (Align)
00184             {
00185                 case UI::Txt_Left:
00186                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Left;
00187                     break;
00188                 case UI::Txt_Right:
00189                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Right;
00190                     break;
00191                 case UI::Txt_Middle:
00192                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre;
00193                     break;
00194                 default:
00195                     return;
00196             }
00197             GorillaCaption->align(HA);
00198         }
00199 
00200         void Caption::VerticallyAlign(UI::TextVerticalAlign Align)
00201         {
00202             Gorilla::VerticalAlignment VA;
00203             switch (Align)
00204             {
00205                 case UI::Txt_Top:
00206                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Top;
00207                     break;
00208                 case UI::Txt_Bottom:
00209                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Bottom;
00210                     break;
00211                 case UI::Txt_Center:
00212                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle;
00213                     break;
00214                 default:
00215                     return;
00216             }
00217             GorillaCaption->vertical_align(VA);
00218         }
00219 
00220         void Caption::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00221         {
00222             RelPosition = Position;
00223             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00224             GorillaCaption->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00225             GorillaCaption->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00226             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00227             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00228         }
00229 
00230         Vector2 Caption::GetPosition()
00231         {
00232             return RelPosition;
00233         }
00234 
00235         void Caption::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00236         {
00237             GorillaCaption->left(Position.X);
00238             GorillaCaption->top(Position.Y);
00239             GorillaRectangle->left(Position.X);
00240             GorillaRectangle->top(Position.Y);
00241         }
00242 
00243         Vector2 Caption::GetActualPosition()
00244         {
00245             Vector2 Pos(GorillaCaption->left(), GorillaCaption->top());
00246             return Pos;
00247         }
00248 
00249         void Caption::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00250         {
00251             RelSize = Size;
00252             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00253             GorillaCaption->width(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00254             GorillaCaption->height(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00255             GorillaRectangle->width(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00256             GorillaRectangle->height(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00257         }
00258 
00259         Vector2 Caption::GetSize()
00260         {
00261             return RelSize;
00262         }
00263 
00264         void Caption::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00265         {
00266             GorillaCaption->width(Size.X);
00267             GorillaCaption->height(Size.Y);
00268             GorillaRectangle->width(Size.X);
00269             GorillaRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00270         }
00271 
00272         Vector2 Caption::GetActualSize()
00273         {
00274             Vector2 Pos(GorillaCaption->width(), GorillaCaption->height());
00275             return Pos;
00276         }

00278         void Caption::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00279         {
00280             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00281             switch(Priority)
00282             {
00283                 case UI::RP_Low:
00284                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00285                     break;
00286                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00287                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00288                     break;
00289                 case UI::RP_High:
00290                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00291                     break;
00292                 default:
00293                     break;
00294             }
00295             GorillaCaption->RenderPriority(RP);
00296             GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00297         }
00298 
00299         UI::RenderPriority Caption::GetRenderPriority()
00300         {
00301             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GorillaCaption->RenderPriority();
00302             switch(RP)
00303             {
00304                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00305                     return UI::RP_Low;
00306                     break;
00307                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00308                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00309                     break;
00310                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00311                     return UI::RP_High;
00312                     break;
00313                 default:
00314                     break;
00315             }
00316             return UI::RP_Medium;
00317         }
